subject: Policy Circular regarding foreign visit/ tours/delegation/training programmes.
text: HRal <rlv <TTHRf xferarrut 77n4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (st 1+767 3m< TToTNf AATTTT) 54 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 Q 6, #aer-10, ERal, # Rarff-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10. Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11014/11/2016-HR-I 01.12.2016 Policy Circular (L3.4.28/2016) Chairman has directed that all files pertaining to the nomination of officials for foreign visit/delegation/training programmes, thereafter tour programme of the nominated officials for visiting abroad should also be routed through Member (Administration) for Chairman'$ approval:. 2 The above instructions are issued for strict compliance by all concerned. (Col.S.S. Kapur) General Manager (HR/Admin) To All officers at NHAI Hqs Copy to: All Members/CVO 2 TSO to Chairman Mnum NHAI nkY
